name: Harmony Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Collection Harmony Sauna by Dundalk LeisureCraft is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in color and has tight knots in the wood. This Sauna kit comes with solid cedar cradles, aluminum bands with stainless steel hardware and is packaged in a ready to assemble kit. This Sauna seats 2-4 people making it the perfect backyard getaway for you, your spouse and small family.

name: CT Granby Cabin Sauna
description: The Granby Cabin Sauna is another model in the Canadian Timber Collection manufactured with Eastern White Cedar. The 1.5 inch (35mm) thick walls and roof boards make this 6'x6' (182cm) sauna easy and efficient to heat up and will fit 2 or 3 people comfortably. 2 Tier Benches on the back wall allow for upper and lower seating, this model only comes with electric heater options.

name: Serenity Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Collection Sauna by Dundalk LeisureCraft is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in color and has tight knots in the wood. The door is 5mm bronze tempered glass with wooden frame and pre-hung on the front wall for easy installation.

name: Tranquility Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Tranquility Barrel Sauna with 45cm Porch that seats 6-8 people is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that has a lighter color and tight knots in the wood. A great sauna for larger families, or your favorite get together spot.

name: Canadian Timber Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Collection Luna Sauna by Dundalk LeisureCraft is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in color and has tight knots in the wood. This Luna Sauna kit will seat 2-4 people, comes with solid cedar floor joists, floor and walls, white cedar bevel siding for the sides and is packaged in a ready to assemble kit.

name: Georgian Cabin Sauna w Porch
description: The Georgian Cabin Sauna with Changeroom, part of the Canadian Timber Collection, is handcrafted by Leisurecraft from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in colour and has tight knots in the wood. The cabin shape fits in well with all cottages and homes and comes in kit form. The metal shingle roof ensures that your sauna is dry and ready to enjoy. It can fit 2-6 persons.

name: Serenity MP Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Collection Sauna by Dundalk LeisureCraft is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in color and has tight knots in the wood. The door is 5mm bronze tempered glass with wooden frame and pre-hung on the front wall for easy installation.

name: Tranquility MP Sauna
description: This Canadian Timber Collection Sauna by Dundalk LeisureCraft is handcrafted from Eastern White Cedar that is lighter in color and has tight knots in the wood. The door is 5mm bronze tempered glass with wooden frame and pre-hung on the front wall for easy installation.

name: The Arctic Plunge Tub - Clear Red Cedar test
description: Experience cold plunge therapy with The Arctic Cold Plunge Tub that is manufactured in Canada by Leisurecraft to match the same quality of your sauna or hot tub. The white plastic shell is cut and welded with HDPE plastic and comes with a cedar skirt held in place by the stainless steel bands. Fill this tub with cold water or buy the optional chiller unit which has a built in ozone filter for ease of mind cold tub therapy. The solid cedar cover and steps are great accessories as well and the Arctic Cold Plunge Tub comes completely assembled and ready to use!

name: The Arctic Plunge Tub - Knotty Red Cedar
description: Experience cold plunge therapy with The Arctic Cold Plunge Tub that is manufactured in Canada by Leisurecraft to match the same quality of your sauna or hot tub. The white plastic shell is cut and welded with HDPE plastic and comes with a cedar skirt held in place by the stainless steel bands. Fill this tub with cold water or buy the optional chiller unit which has a built in ozone filter for ease of mind cold tub therapy. The solid cedar cover and steps are great accessories as well and the Arctic Cold Plunge Tub comes completely assembled and ready to use!

name: The Original Cedar Hot Tub 5'
description: The Original Cedar Tub is handcrafted with clear western red cedar and is a standard  (107cm) total height with inside depth of  (96cm). Enjoy a total off grid soak with the peaceful crackling of the aluminum wood fired heater and all natural wooden tub.

name: The Evolution Cedar Tub 5' - Knotty Red Cedar
description: Introducing the Evolution 5' Wood Burning Hot Tub – the perfect addition to your cottage or home for ultimate relaxation in a compact, efficient package. Designed to comfortably seat two people, this smaller version of our popular 7' Evolution model delivers all the benefits of a traditional wood-burning hot tub in a more intimate size. This model comes fully assembled and ready to use! Crafted from durable, knotty Western Red Cedar, this hot tub features a robust white HDPE plastic liner that is 3/8 thick, ensuring long-lasting performance. Whether you're soaking in the warmth or enjoying a cozy, serene atmosphere, the Evolution 5' hot tub is designed to heat up in just 2 hours, providing quick access to relaxation For added convenience, the tub comes with the option of a 3-tier step system for easy access and a vinyl insulated cover to maintain heat and protect the tub when not in use. Made in Canada, this wood-burning hot tub combines rustic charm with modern engineering, making it the ideal choice for those seeking a premium yet compact spa experience. Perfect for unwinding after a long day, the Evolution 5' is your gateway to peaceful, private relaxation.

name: The Cascade Tub 3'x7'
description: Step back in time with The Cascade Tub also Made in Canada by Leisurecraft and shipped to you in a ready to use package. Comfortable sit 2 people in this model which can be used as a wood burning hot tub or without the heater for cold plunge therapy. The 5052 aluminum shell and optional wood heater are light weight and easy to clean, red cedar skirting on the outside can be left natural or stained to match your surroundings. The heat up time is less then 3 hours and out different cover options help keep the heat inside and the water clean when not in use. Each woodburning hot tub include a drain that will connect to your garden hose for easy draining and holds 233 gallons of water. (885 litres)

name: Cloudburst Outdoor Shower
description: This superb deluxe outdoor cedar barrel shower comes in a prefabricated kit that can be assembled in approximately 2 hours. This superb shower is great to use after your sauna session or a swim in the lake, ocean or pool to wash away sand, salt or chlorine.

name: Rainbow Outdoor Shower
description:
This superb deluxe outdoor cedar barrel shower arrives as a prefabricated kit that can be easily assembled.   The rainbow outdoor shower is an effortless upgrade to your outdoor space. Crafted from premium cedar, it offers both durability and a warm, spa-like aesthetic that complements any sauna or backyard setting.

Perfect for rinsing off after a rejuvenating sauna session, or a refreshing dip in the lake, ocean, or pool, this outdoor shower helps wash away sand, salt, and chlorine with ease. Beyond convenience, it elevates your outdoor routine—turning a simple rinse into a refreshing, resort-style experience you’ll enjoy season after season.

name: Sunlight Outdoor Shower - Knotty Red Cedar
description: Enjoy the outdoors with our open air Sunlight Outdoor Shower. Easy to assemble, hook up and move around if needed this shower is the perfect choice by your swimming pool or hot tub to rinse off or for a quick cool down.

name: The Mini
description:
The Studio 6 Mini Sauna seats 2–3 people, offering a sleek, modern design that perfectly balances efficiency.. Built with precision and crafted for year-round use, the Studio 6 Mini features a minimalist cube structure with clean lines and contemporary finishes. Choose between horizontal or vertical metal or aluminum siding to complement your space and style.

Inside, enjoy a modern two-tier bench system that runs front to back for optimal comfort and heat circulation. The double-pane bronze glass front adds both warmth and privacy while maintaining a refined aesthetic. Constructed using SIP panel insulation, this unit is engineered for superior energy efficiency and durability through all Canadian seasons.
features: Crafted from Canadian Red Cedar interior
Choice of metal or aluminum exterior siding (horizontal or vertical)

name: The Neptune
description:
A striking modern sauna that brings nature closer with its wide glass design that brings nature in. Read more The Neptune combines contemporary style with the warmth of cedar for a luxurious, immersive outdoor experience
The Neptune Sauna seamlessly integrates the outdoors into its design through an expansive glass front wall. Immerse yourself in nature within the spacious interior. This modular sauna kit can be assembled effortlessly in any setting. With its sleek black metal siding, EPDM roofing, and the warm touch of Canadian cedar inside, it embodies a distinctive and contemporary outdoor sauna.
A striking modern sauna that brings nature closer with its panoramic glass design. The Neptune combines contemporary style with the warmth of cedar for a luxurious, immersive outdoor experience.


•	Comfortably Seats 5-7
•	113" L x 89" W x 91" H
•	Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar
•	Large Glass Front Wall
•	2-Tier Benches
•	EPDM Roof
•	Spacious Interior

* Please note: Electric heaters require a certified electrician to hardwire the unit directly into your electrical panel.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar

name: The Orion
description: Introducing The Orion Sauna, a luxurious haven crafted from Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar.      Enhanced by its sleek wrap-around front glass. Designed to blend elegance with functionality, The Orion Sauna offers an inviting retreat to melt away stress and promote wellness with ease. Its sophisticated design and intuitive controls make every session a relaxing escape. Immerse yourself in nature within the spacious interior, with the option to install insulation separately for the floor, walls, and roof.

description:
Experience modern comfort and natural elegance with this contemporary outdoor sauna, designed for relaxation.
A contemporary outdoor sauna that blends modern architecture with natural warmth. The peaked roof and open interior create a relaxing escape for families or small groups.
A modern and sophisticated design that features a peaked roof. Relax and rejuvenate with your family or friends in this clean and modern sauna and immerse yourself in nature within the spacious interior, with the option to install insulation separately for the floor, walls, and roof.

description:
A sleek two-person outdoor sauna designed for comfort and style that blends modern architecture with nature.  The large glass front and optional semi-privacy panels for the perfect balance of openness and seclusion.
The Outdoor 552 Pure Cube Sauna - 2 Person is an attractive and stylish design that features a large window panel on the front wall beside the full glass door. Modernize your outdoor space with optional semi-privacy panels that still feature the double pane glass with a fixed cedar grill on the outside. The 552 is great for couples or small families.

Our Pure Cube Trinity Sauna is a 2 Sided Corner model that will comfortably seat 2 people and fit onto an small deck or patio at your Condo or Cottage! Made with western red cedar and tempered glass windows this model as a special design flat plastic roof tray for year round use.

name: Barrel Sauna
description: Experience the perfect blend of craftsmanship, comfort, and longevity in our signature cedar barrel saunas.   Our uniquely designed outdoor cedar barrel saunas offer an exceptional investment that can be enjoyed for generations. Crafted from premium Western Red Cedar, each sauna features 1½″ thick walls for natural insulation and enduring quality. The rounded barrel shape reduces the heating area for faster warm-up times while providing generous space for relaxing and rejuvenating sessions.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Red Cedar

name: Barrel Sauna w/Changeroom
description: Experience the perfect blend of craftsmanship, comfort, and longevity in our signature cedar barrel saunas. name: Panoramic Barrel Sauna
description: Experience pure relaxation with our Western Red Cedar Panoramic Sauna, designed for comfort and stunning view.Crafted from premium Western Red Cedar, our Panoramic Barrel Sauna combines natural beauty with efficiency. Its 1½″ thick walls provide excellent insulation, while the curved design reduces heating space, ensuring faster warmth and lower energy use. Choose from three bench styles to create a cozy retreat for family and friends as you unwind and enjoy the scenic surroundings.

name: Panoramic Barrel Sauna w/Porch
description: Enjoy scenic tranquility and extra space with our Panoramic Sauna with Porch, built for comfort and charm.     The Panoramic Barrel Sauna with Porch blends elegance and practicality. Made from durable Western Red Cedar, it features 1½″ thick insulated walls and a curved design for efficient heating. The front porch offers a cooling spot between sessions or a place to enjoy the view, while the interior’s flexible bench options ensure every moment inside is relaxing and inviting.

name: Panoramic Barrel Sauna w/Changeroom
description: Step into comfort and privacy with our Panoramic Sauna with Changeroom, crafted from Western Red Cedar. Our Panoramic Barrel Sauna with Changeroom adds functionality to luxury. The integrated changeroom offers privacy and convenience before entering the heat, while the cedar construction ensures natural insulation and lasting beauty. Its barrel design minimizes heating time and maximizes efficiency, making it perfect for a shared, rejuvenating sauna experience with a touch of sophistication.

name: The Luna Sauna
description: The Luna Sauna offers a sleek and sophisticated addition to your home or cottage.  Modern, Sleek Sauna.         This modular pre-built sauna kit boasts a large double pane tempered glass front window and full glass door, providing beautiful outdoor views and excellent thermal insulation. Experience the perfect blend of luxury and practicality with this modern Luna Sauna kit, ideal for creating a relaxing and rejuvenating sauna experience for you and your family or friends.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar

name: Indoor Sauna - 550
description: A compact luxury sauna designed to elevate indoor wellness with comfort, style, and modern glass accents spa. The Pure Cube PU550 Indoor Sauna is an attractive and stylish design that features a large window panel on the front wall beside the full glass door. Modernize your indoor space with optional semi-privacy panels that still feature the double pane glass with a fixed cedar grill on the outside. The Pure Cube PU550 Indoor Sauna comes in easy to assemble wall and roof panels and prebuilt solid cedar benches and duckboard floor. This model comes with an electric heater and comfortably sits up to 2 adults. Comfortable and cozy the Pure Cube PU550 Indoor Sauna is great for couples or small families.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar

name: Indoor Sauna - 570
description: Transform your home with a beautifully crafted indoor sauna that blends modern elegance with lasting comfort. The Pure Cube PU570 Indoor Sauna showcases a striking design with a full glass door framed by wide window panels for a bright, open feel. Enhance your private retreat with optional semi-privacy panels that maintain double-pane tempered glass while adding an elegant cedar exterior grill. The Pure Cube PU570 is a serene escape crafted for unwinding at the end of the day—perfect for peaceful moments alone or relaxing with loved ones.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar

name: Indoor Dundalk Cabin Sauna - LS460
description: Experience pure relaxation with a premium indoor cabin sauna built for comfort warmth, and everyday wellness. The Dundalk Experience Indoor Cabin Sauna brings the ultimate blend of comfort, style, and wellness into your home. Thoughtfully designed with premium materials, this indoor cabin sauna creates a warm, inviting retreat where you can escape the stress of the day and reconnect with deep relaxation. Its spacious interior, crafted with precision and care, delivers a soothing heat experience ideal for individuals, couples, or small families.Every detail is engineered for wellness—from the natural aroma of cedar to the even, enveloping warmth that promotes muscle relief, detoxification, and improved circulation. The clean, modern aesthetic makes this sauna a beautiful addition to any indoor space, while its sturdy construction ensures long-lasting performance you can rely on for years. Whether you're winding down after a long day, enhancing your wellness routine, or creating a private sanctuary at home, the Dundalk Experience Indoor Cabin Sauna offers a truly rejuvenating escape that transforms your daily routine into therapeutic self-care.
features: Crafted from Canadian Clear or Knotty Cedar

name: The Glacier Plunge Tub
description: The Glacier Cold Plunge Tub is one of the finest in its class, manufactured in Canada by Leisurecraft.        Now available with either 304 Stainless Steel Interior or white HPDE Plastic and clear or knotty red cedar skirt. This new and improved model is your quality solution for cold plunge therapy with or without a sauna. The optional roll up cover will keep your water clean when not in use and an easy to use drain that will connect to any garden hose is included with all cold plunge tubs. The total outside measurement is 71 x 33x 25 in High with angled sides for easy in and out access and will hold 190 gallons (720 litres) of water. Experience cold plunge therapy with The Arctic Cold Plunge Tub that is manufactured in Canada by Leisurecraft to match the same quality of your sauna or hot tub. The white plastic shell is cut and welded with HDPE plastic and comes with a cedar skirt held in place by the stainless steel bands. Fill this tub with cold water or buy the optional chiller unit which has a built in ozone filter for ease of mind cold tub therapy. The solid cedar cover and steps are great accessories as well and the Arctic Cold Plunge Tub comes completely assembled and ready to use!

name: The Max
description:
The Max sauna is designed to give that comfort feeling whether at home or the cottage. The Max is perfection.   Designed to bring a full wellness experience to your backyard or cottage. Its bold, modern cube structure combines architectural precision with everyday function, making it a standout addition to any outdoor space. Choose between horizontal or vertical metal or aluminum siding to create a look that complements your environment.

Inside, the expanded two-tier bench system runs front to back, providing ample seating for up to six people. The double-pane bronze glass front offers the perfect balance of openness and privacy, while the SIP panel insulation ensures consistent heat retention and all-season performance. Crafted with premium materials and refined details, the Studio 6 Max delivers the ultimate in design, comfort, and durability.

• Comfortably seats 4
• 89" W x 72" D x 93" H (exterior)
• Crafted from Canadian Red Cedar interior
• Choice of metal or aluminum exterior siding (horizontal or vertical)
• Modern 2-tier bench system
• Double-pane bronze glass window
• SIP panel insulated structure
